channel.title: How do i change the ip my server starts on?
channel.description:
when i run my server it runs on 0.0.0.0 or my ip, how do i set that to my no-ip.org domain?
i look on most tuts... no help!

item.title: How do i change the ip my server starts on?

item.description:
@kiev wrote:

done that but what rules do i have to do to my router?

item.title: How do i change the ip my server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @lilg101 lilg101
item.description:
@lilg101 wrote:

just go towww.no-ip.com then click login type ur username and password that you created once your in click on host then follow on screen instructions easy as pie.

item.title: How do i change the ip my server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @kiev kiev
item.description:
@kiev wrote:

ok so i have a no-ip going to my router which has open ports… it should work?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 08:47:05 AM[/size][hr]do i have to set the no-ip to my hamachi ip?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 08:55:13 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help i tryed setting it to my ip and my ham ip says illegal ip!

item.title: How do i change the ip my server starts on?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Its supposed to start on 0.0.0.0:(port)
No-Ip just redirects directly to the server…
